DOC.brief_summary: The aim study determine prevalence menstrual cycle relate pain complain adolescent young adult .
DOC.brief_title: Prevalence Menstrual Cycle Related Pain Complains Adolescents Young Adults
DOC.detailed_description: An internet questionnaire 12 item use : Adolescents - start menstruation - characteristic menstrual cycle - pain related menstrual cycle ( question base well-known pain-complaints related presence endometriosis ) - analgetics - influence school carrier - influence social life Young adult - idem adolescent - influence pain eventual sexual relationship
DOC.criteria: 3rd year high school girl 1st year university young female premenarcheal girl
